divs: Sighting Detailsi was driving looked up seen 3 circles i tired to call m dad to look out and see them i was only a mile from home he didnt answer so i got my phone out to take a picture and my gf said they will see you right then 2 went away only the middle one was left it remained there for 10 seconds then it was gone. i was driving west they were orange large in size cant tell how far away they were or how high
